Title: Emergency First Aid
Description:
We must treat our wounded before we can begin searching for my... for the missing expedition.

Take this first aid kit and tend to the survivors. The Horde leaves no one behind!
ObjectivesText: Use a First Aid Kit on Bo, Mithdran Dawntracker, and Lana Jordan.
RewardText: We're back on our feet. Now let's move. The lost expedition is somewhere on this island.

Objectives.Text: First Aid Kit used on Lana Jordan
First Aid Kit used on Bo
First Aid Kit used on Mithdran Dawntracker
